present.english: The sick patient feels the strong pain
The young children feel the simple happiness

The sick patient was feeling the strong pain
The young children were feeling the simple happiness

future.english: I will feel the bad cold
The sick patient will feel the strong pain
The young children will feel the simple happiness

aorist.english: The sick patient felt the strong pain
The young children felt the simple happiness

optative.english: I should feel the bad cold
